name: ShapeShift (Fun Base Alpha)
description:
This is the first game we ever made. The controls are horrible. Change to the correctly colored shape to pass through the energy walls. Three laps wins. Have Fun.

Controls:

Player 1

WASD for movement and H,J,K,L to transform into a square, circle, triangle, and pentagram respectively.

Player 2

Arrow keys for movement and NumPad 7, 8, 9, and + for the shapes. (sorry)
